attributes.action: Suspend or remove Baroness Jones of Moulsecoomb from the House of Lords.
attributes.additional_details:
Comments suggesting a 6pm curfew on men are sexist, derogatory and downright idiotic.
She is clearly not of a competent enough faculty to be part of the team that leads the country.
attributes.background: Ensure Baroness Jones of Moulsecoomb from the House of Lords has any authority or influence stripped from Parliament.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for members of the House of Lords to be sacked or resign. Deciding whether to leave the House of Lords is a matter for individual peers, not the Government or House of Commons.
